(B) one
(C) two
(D) three
(E) four
(F) five
(G) six
(H) seven
(I) eight
(J) nine
(K) ten
(L) eleven
(M) twelve
(N) thirteen
(O) fourteen
(P) fifteen

model_outputs.model_answer:

- Three grey cat toys
- Three grey notebooks
The total is six. 
Now, we need to subtract the number of notebooks from the total. 
- Six - 3 = Three
Therefore, there will remain three grey objects on the floor after removing all the notebooks. The answer is (B).
